description: You can use AWS::Organizations::ResourcePolicy to delegate policy management for AWS Organizations to specified member accounts to perform policy actions that are by default available only to the management account.

Content.description: The policy document. For AWS CloudFormation templates formatted in YAML, you can provide the policy in JSON or YAML format. AWS CloudFormation always converts a YAML policy to JSON format before submitting it.
Content.markdownDescription:
The policy document. For AWS CloudFormation templates formatted in YAML, you can provide the policy in JSON or YAML format. AWS CloudFormation always converts a YAML policy to JSON format before submitting it.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: ['object', 'string']  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 40000  
Pattern: [\s\S]*  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: A list of tags that you want to attach to the resource policy
Tags.markdownDescription:
A list of tags that you want to attach to the resource policy

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A custom key-value pair associated with a resource within your organization.

Key.description: The key identifier, or name, of the tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key identifier, or name, of the tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The string value that's associated with the key of the tag. You can set the value of a tag to an empty string, but you can't set the value of a tag to null.
Value.markdownDescription:
The string value that's associated with the key of the tag. You can set the value of a tag to an empty string, but you can't set the value of a tag to null.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A custom key-value pair associated with a resource within your organization.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Id.description: The unique identifier (ID) associated with this resource policy.
Id.markdownDescription:
The unique identifier (ID) associated with this resource policy.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 131  
Pattern: ^rp-[0-9a-zA-Z_]{4,128}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource policy.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource policy.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws.*:organizations::\d{12}:resourcepolicy\/o-[a-z0-9]{10,32}\/rp-[0-9a-zA-Z_]{4,128}  
Update requires: No interruption
